pageContext.claim: “Look, Biden and his son are stone-cold crooked. And you know it. His son walks out with millions of dollars. The kid knows nothing. You know it, and so do we.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has no evidence to claim former vice president Joe Biden is "stone-cold crooked." Biden, unlike Trump, had disclosed decades of tax returns. Hunter Biden, one of his sons, did business deals that might not have come his way if he had not been a vice president's son, but the same could be said of Trump's adult children.
